title: I just got a phone call. How can I tell who called? - Quora

response.answer_text: Call display if it's a number you dont recognize call the number back and see who it is it may be a wrong number it may be someone you know calling from a diffrent number or it may be your doctor or dentist or bank are you looking for employment prehaps it's a potential employer wanting to interveiw you just call the number back see who called
